page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: This area is on the outskirts of {Reading}in the prosperous{Thames {Valley.}The area has become important for firms producing high technology goods,in particular manufacture of computers,both hardware and software.The unemployment rate in Woodley is{17%,4%}of this is long term unemployment.{21%}of the people living in the area work in{Woodley.32%}work in{Reading.11%}in the{Thames {Valley,16%}in{London.30%}of people in Woodley work in public service,{26% work in commerce,{26%}industry and{14% work in trade.{67%}of the people in {Woodley}work full time,{30%}work part time.{4%}of people do some kind of industry work.About{50%}of the people in{Woodley}stay at home doing housework.There are very few people doing outwork for firms.
